parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: 1. If you specify a value smaller than 1, pages start from page 1.

parameters.name: DriverName
parameters.description: The name of the driver whose information is to be queried. If you want to query information about drivers with a specific name, set this parameter.

parameters.name: IotInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the Internet of Things (IoT) service instance. This parameter is not required for public instances. However, this parameter is required for the instances that you have purchased.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: 30. Default value: 10. If you specify a value smaller than 1, a maximum of 10 entries are displayed on each page.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the driver whose information is to be queried. Valid values:

*   0: official driver
*   1: custom driver
